name: Midi-unit-test-cases
tagline: A start at collecting a set of minimal unit test case midi files, for use in testing standard midi file parsing.
body:
## This is a test
### **1-8 Piano**

| Prog# | Instrument | Example |
|---|---|---|
| 1 | Acoustic Grand | <audio src="program-change/001-acoustic-grand-Piano-single-quarter-note-test.mid" controls preload></audio> |
| 2 | Bright Acoustic | <audio src="program-change/002-bright-acustic-grand-piano-single-quarter-note-test.mid" controls preload></audio> |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
